entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a person who is talking to Harry and avoiding his eyes. He is mentioned as saying 'she' which implies that he is referring to someone else.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is being talked about by Seamus and is feeling frustrated with the situation.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is mentioned as being an old fool according to Mrs. Finnigan's beliefs.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is a newspaper that is mentioned as something that Mrs. Finnigan believes in.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore are believed to be liars by Mrs. Finnigan, according to Seamus.
Seamus is talking to Harry in the story.
